comment.author: 32301491@N08
comment._content: Please put your beautiful TREE in the group `|´ TREES DIE STANDING UP `|´ ...after all :) they give their life for you: oxygen, wood, fruits, shade, beauty, house for the singer birds. Under them you can read, write a love letter, even cry... and your photos are prettier if embraced by them. Please tag the photo:"TREES DIE STANDING UP" and Award 2 photos in the Group Pool.

comment.author: 31746161@N04
comment._content: Thank's for share your beautiful TREES in the group `|´ TREES DIE STANDING UP `|´ ...after all :) they give their life for you... Congratulation for this Wonderful photo! Please, tag "TREES DIE STANDING UP", and Award 2. If you get 5 or more Awards post your image here: Photos with 5 + AWARDS (II).
